description:
Guru Bunbuku gives advice to Gao`s friends. As they puzzle over the meaning of this words, Gaito becomes determined to face Kiri in a Buddyfight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Grim Reaper vs. Death Sentence! The Third Turn of Destiny!
Shinigami VS Shi no Senkoku! Unmei no Dai San Turn!!
死神VS死の宣告! 運命の第三ターン!!
